sentence.Network_en: I am ready to pay to the uttermost farthing.
sentence.Network_cn: 我情愿把这笔债全部还清,连零儿都不剩.

sentence.Network_en: If she fled to the uttermost parts of the earth I should pursue her.
sentence.Network_cn: 任凭她逃到天涯海角,我也要穷追不舍.

sentence.Network_en: Fee's eyes were no longer up to anything beyond the uttermost effort of keeping the books.
sentence.Network_cn: 菲已经目不斜视,将她的全部精力都集中在记帐上了.

means.word_mean: 1. of the greatest possible degree or extent or intensity;
2. (comparatives of `far') most remote in space or time or order;

sentences.sentence: "don't go beyond the farthermost (or furthermost) tree"
